name: Brick Breaker (itch) (zach4873)
description:
Hello! Recently I've decided to start learning game dev by actually FINISHING games.

For a long time I'd get caught up tinkering on projects I would never actually finish and I wanted to change that! So here we are.

I'm going to be doing more projects like this as well as other Game Dev content! So check out my pages below.

MAKING OF VIDEO

MY TWITTER

All music and SFX made by me!

Let me know if you're able to beat the game!
